page.title: 16NEW ROMNEY POSTMEN
page.content: 44 POSTMEN WORK FROM 4.30-11.40AM. THEY DO TWO ROUTES EACH DAY AND WALK BETWEEN 5-20 MILES ON AN AVERAGE DAY. THEY ALTERNATE THE HIGH STREET,NEARBY WALK ROUTES,SHORT DISTANCE CYCLE ROUTES AND LONG OR PARCEL VAN ROUTES. THERE ARE NINE BICYCLES AND NINE VANS. OUR POSTMEN ARE FRIENDLY CHEERFUL AND KIND.ON SUNDAY THE 14TH JULY THE POSTMEN HAD A CHARITY FOOTBALL MATCH AGAINST AGE CONCERN.ON THE DAY WE VISITED THE POST OFFICE INCOMING MAIL FROM ASHFORD INCLUDED,11 BAGS OF LETTERS,9 BAGS OF PARCELS.THESE WERE SORTED INTO 22 BAGS AND THEN INTO BANKS OF PIGEON HOLES WITH STREET NAMES AND CODE NUMBERS FOR DISTRIBUTION.BY TWELVE O'CLOCK THE FRANKING MACHINE HAD CANCELLED 35430 COLLECTED AROUND THE AREA.
